text: unkalal inaiyakkappattavarkalil cattiyattin pal valikattupavan unta? Enru ketpirak allahtan cattiyattirku valikattukiran enru kuruviraka. Cattiyattirku valikattupavan pinparrappatatakkavana? Valikattappattaleyanri nervaliyataiya mattane avan pinparrat takkavana? Unkalukku enna nerntu vittatu? Evvaru tirppalikkirirkal
